name: 约翰·安布罗斯·弗莱明
bio_short: 英国电气工程师和物理学家。他将“爱迪生效应”（`edison_effect_1883`）付诸实践，发明了“弗莱明阀”（`fleming_diode_1904`），即第一个“真空管二极管”，开启了电子学时代。
bio_short_en: An English electrical engineer and physicist. He put the 'Edison effect' (`edison_effect_1883`) to practical use by inventing the 'Fleming Valve' (`fleming_diode_1904`), the first vacuum tube diode, which started the age of electronics.
